name: MEMENTO MORI & CARPE DIEM
description: In human life, we cannot escape uncertainty. Because of this uncertainty, humans are often faced with indecision (Heidegger). One of the certain things in life is aging and death. Memento mori in Latin, which means remember death. This word can mean a reflection on how short life is, or it can mean that what we have in life is temporary. so for that, we need to appreciate what is today and believe as little as possible tomorrow ( carpe diem, quam minimum credula postero) . life is meaningful and meaning every life around you.
